languages.text: Посовещавшись, старшие офицеры пришли к единогласному мнению: помочь вам со столь масштабным проектом в силах лишь технологии Адептус Механикус. Вольному Торговцу стоит связаться с их представителями в Просторе Коронус и провести переговоры о возможном сотрудничестве.

traits.locale_text: Посовещавшись, старшие офицеры пришли к единогласному мнению: помочь вам со столь масштабным проектом в силах лишь технологии Адептус Механикус. Вольному Торговцу стоит связяться с их представителями в Коронусе и провести переговоры о возможном контракте и сотрудничестве.

languages.text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.
languages.original_text: Посовещавшись, старшие офицеры пришли к единогласному мнению: помочь вам со столь масштабным проектом в силах лишь технологии Адептус Механикус. Вольному Торговцу стоит связаться с их представителями в Просторе Коронус и провести переговоры о возможном сотрудничестве.

traits.locale_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously deicded that only Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously deicded that only Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

languages.text: 经过深思熟虑后，高级军官一致认为，只有机械修会才拥有这种大规模工程所需的技术。行商浪人应该联系他们在科罗努斯扩区的代表，确保未来的合作。
languages.original_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: 经过深思熟虑后，高级军官一致认为，只有机械修会才拥有这种大规模工程所需的技术。行商浪人应该联系他们在科罗努斯扩区的代表，确保未来的合作。

languages.text: 審議の結果、上級士官の満場一致で、このような大規模なプロジェクトに必要な技術を持っているのは、帝国技術局だけである判断された。ローグトレーダーはコロヌス・エクスパンスの代表と連絡を取り、今後の協力を取り付ける必要がある。
languages.original_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: 審議の結果、上級士官の満場一致で、このような大規模なプロジェクトに必要な技術を持っているのは、帝国技術局だけである判断された。ローグトレーダーはコロヌス・エクスパンスの代表と連絡を取り、今後の協力を取り付ける必要がある。

languages.text: Tras deliberar, los oficiales superiores decidieron por unanimidad que sólo el Adeptus Mechanicus posee las tecnologías necesarias para un proyecto de tal envergadura. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería contactar con sus representantes en la Extensión de Koronus y asegurar una futura cooperación.
languages.original_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Tras deliberar, los oficiales superiores decidieron por unanimidad que sólo el Adeptus Mechanicus posee las tecnologías necesarias para un proyecto de tal envergadura. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería contactar con sus representantes en la Extensión de Koronus y asegurar una futura cooperación.

languages.text: Nach einer Beratung waren sich die leitenden Offiziere einig, dass nur das Adeptus Mechanicus die Technologie besitzt, um ein solch gigantisches Projekt umzusetzen. Es wurde entschieden, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} deren Vertreter in der Koronus-Ausdehnung kontaktiert und eine Kooperation aushandelt.
languages.original_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Nach einer Beratung waren sich die leitenden Offiziere einig, dass nur das Adeptus Mechanicus die Technologie besitzt, um ein solch gigantisches Projekt umzusetzen. Es wurde entschieden, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} deren Vertreter in der Koronus-Ausdehnung kontaktiert und eine Kooperation aushandelt.

languages.text: Après concertation, les officiers supérieurs conviennent à l'unanimité que seul l'Adeptus Mechanicus dispose des technologies nécessaires à la mise en œuvre d'un projet de cette ampleur. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} devrait contacter ses représentants dans les Étendues de Koronus afin de s'adjoindre leur future coopération.
languages.original_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Après concertation, les officiers supérieurs conviennent à l'unanimité que seul l'Adeptus Mechanicus dispose des technologies nécessaires à la mise en œuvre d'un projet de cette ampleur. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} devrait contacter ses représentants dans les Étendues de Koronus afin de s'adjoindre leur future coopération.

languages.text: Yapılan görüşmelerin ardından kıdemli subaylar, böylesine büyük ölçekli bir proje için gereken teknolojinin yalnızca Adeptus Mechanicus'un elinde mevcut olduğuna oy birliğiyle karar veriyor. Hür Tacir, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki temsilcilerle temas kurmalı ve gelecekte iş birliği yapmalarını sağlamalı.
languages.original_text: After deliberating, the senior officers unanimously decided that only the Adeptus Mechanicus possess the technologies required for a project of such a massive scale. The Rogue Trader should contact their representatives in the Koronus Expanse and secure future cooperation.
